resources.string: 1. How does a DDoS attack impact our business financially?\nDDoS attacks can cost between $20,000 to $100,000 per hour. E-commerce losses can exceed $1 million.
2. How does ICADS help reduce these financial losses?\nICADS detects attacks early, reducing downtime by up to 80%, saving major costs.
3. What is the ROI of using ICADS?\nAvoiding one major attack yearly can deliver ROI over 400%.
4. Can ICADS help avoid reputational damage?\nYes. A single outage can lower customer trust by 30%. ICADS minimizes that risk.
5. What is the cost of not using ICADS?\nYou may face recovery/legal costs exceeding $200,000 plus lost revenue.
6. How is DDoS loss calculated?\nLoss = downtime + lost revenue + recovery cost + reputation impact.
7. What types of attacks affect our revenue?\nDDoS, SYN floods, UDP floods â€” they halt sites, APIs, or apps.
8. Does ICADS help with compliance?\nYes. It supports ISO 27001 and others, avoiding penalties.
9. Is ICADS suitable for small businesses?\nYes. Even 15-minute outages can cost $15,000. ICADS is cost-effective.
10. Does ICADS provide ROI reports?\nYes. It shows blocked attacks and estimated money saved.
